subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Jeff Francoeur, who was hitting .250 with five homers before Atlanta traded him to the Mets, is again searching for answers after productive seasons in 2006 and 2007.
snippet: Jeff Francoeur, who was hitting .250 with five homers before Atlanta traded him to the Mets, is again searching for answers after productive seasons in 2006 and 2007.
